attributes.action: Cancel GCSES and A levels for 2021 and provide teacher assessed grades instead
attributes.additional_details: Coronavirus has had a significant impact on schools and students due to the loss of education and stress presented with sitting exams next year. The uncertainty of weather exams will be going ahead and having to catch up on subjects all present many problems on top of already existing issues, with many students suffering with mental health issues due to the pandemic all on top of sitting GCSES
attributes.background: Due to the impact of coronavirus on students in school it is blatantly unfair for students to sit exams with only 3 weeks to make up for this loss of education and only minor tweaks to the GCSE curriculum in some of the subjects.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
